title: #92Noon! 9a Hour 4/14 - Hasseltine/Quickies/Takes
description: Eric Hasseltine is the 18yr voice of the Memphis Grizzlies and he opens the show with PA. Then, we handle some quickie sports opinions and ask "is this a bad take" before firing off a few doozies and listening to rube reaction on the Talkback!
